description:
The Ohts Alliance has begun it`s attack. The protagonist doesn`t care about the outcome of the war, but she heads to the battlefield for the experience points! Despite her lack of investment, she sides with the Sariella Army in order to earn XP. She`ll need to take advantage of this fighting in order to defeat Ariel.  But then, Ariel herself appears on the battlefield...
Source: crunchyroll
